testcase.title: rhsm.gui.tests.import_tests.import_validate_cert_shows_in_consumed
testcase.description:
Tests if imported cert shows up in both CLI consumed list and the My Subscriptions tab
1. Attaches a random subscription 2. Finds the entitlement associated with the pool-id of the subscription above 3. Creates an importable cert based on the entitlement 4. Removes local data via a subscription-manager clean command 5. Imports the cert associated with the random product we attached 6. Runs the list --consumed command to verify that product is still consumed 7. Verifies that the product shows in the My Subscriptions tab
